javascript
function FindProxyForURL(url, host) {
  const directList = [
    "www.baidu.com",
    "www.bilibili.com",
    "10.11.12.13",
  ];
  if (directList.includes(host)) {
    return "DIRECT";
  }
  return "PROXY 127.0.0.1:%mixed-port%; SOCKS5 127.0.0.1:%mixed-port%; DIRECT;";
}
